name: evolve-idle-automation
description: Adds unlockable automations to Evolve Idle

scripts.start: web-ext run --watch-ignored *.* **/firefox-profile-evolve-idle/**/* src/**/* settings/**/* node_modules/**/* icons/**/* --start-url https://pmotschmann.github.io/Evolve/ --firefox-profile=.\firefox-profile-evolve-idle --profile-create-if-missing --keep-profile-changes --verbose
scripts.dev: start npm run sass-watch & start npm run webpack-watch & start npm run start
